timeline.bodyText: Remove text after "ok" or " violation" in this and other lines. On exact code there is no "if".
timeline.author: romani

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java index f4943b469..873f74240 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java @@ -71,22 +87,17 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.CommonUtil; * </module> * *

Example:

- *
- * public class MyTest {
- *  public static void myTest() {
- *      if (foo) { // OK, 'if' followed by whitespace
- *              //...
- *      } else if(bar) { // violation, 'if' not followed by whitespace
- *              //...
- *      }
+ * 
+ *     public void myTest() {
+ *         int a; int b;           // OK
+ *         int a;int b;            // violation
  *
- *      testMethod(foo, bar); // OK, ',' followed by whitespace
- *      testMethod(foo,bar); // violation, ',' not followed by whitespace
+ *         testMethod(foo, bar);   // OK
+ *         testMethod(foo,bar);    // violation
  *
- *      for(;;;){} // OK, WhitespaceAfter doesn't check empty for iterators
- *      }
- *  }
- *

+ *         for(;;) {} // OK
+ *     }
+ *
* @since 3.0 */ @StatelessCheck

timeline.bodyText:
Please remove class definition, the less  unnecessary code in example the better.
Your code is not compilable, so extra code does no good.
timeline.author: romani

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java index 43dca538b..873f74240 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/whitespace/WhitespaceAfterCheck.java @@ -64,8 +64,7 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.CommonUtil; * *

Example:

- * public class MyTest {
- *  public static void myTest() {
+ *  public void myTest() {
  *      if (foo) {              // OK
  *              //...
  *      } else if(bar) {        // violation

timeline.bodyText: Do you know why this is ok ? If this is big it it is better to not put it in example.
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,6 +62,23 @@ * 
  * <module name="WhitespaceAfter"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * public class MyTest {
+ *  public static void myTest() {
+ *      if (foo) {              // OK
+ *              //...
+ *      } else if(bar) {        // violation
+ *              //...
+ *      }
+ *
+ *      testMethod(foo, bar);   // OK
+ *      testMethod(foo,bar);    // violation
+ *
+ *      for(;;){}               // OK

replies.bodyText:
This is the intended behavior:

Checks that a token is followed by whitespace, with the exception that it does not check for whitespace after the semicolon of an empty for iterator. Use Check EmptyForIteratorPad to validate empty for iterators.

So, I thought it best to show that.
replies.author: nmancus1
